description: A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suit or the capital A in the center of the face, there's picture of a closed rucksack, with a small arrow pointing up next to it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's picture of a running person, and next to them, a small arrow pointing up and a plus sign.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a mostly-charged battery laying horizontally, with "zZz" floating over one corner and an arrow pointing up in the opposite.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a shield held by a strong, muscular arm.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of an ancient muscle cuirass with a mace laid over it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a six-sided Star of Life, with an arrow pointing up in a corner next to it.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a heavy counterweight seemingly growing roots.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a feather bent slightly towards the ground.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a heart with a large plus next to it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a picture of a heavy-looking axe leaving a trail, seemingly moving rapidly.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a shield repelling three thick lines away.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a muscle cuirass with a biohazard symbol laid over it.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of a strong, muscular arm flexing.
